amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to carry out the rule entitled "Affirmatively Furthering Fair Housing", published by the Department of Housing and Urban Development in the Federal Register on July 19, 2013.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to carry out the rule entitled "Affirmatively Furthering Fair Housing", published by the Department of Housing and Urban Development in the Federal Register on July 19, 2013.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 193 (Roll no. 311).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 193 (Roll no. 311).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Gosar.
